CRW_BB_2 |guid = 095d67d8-9fe6-4d63-91ad-12a2230e26ad }} '''Tylla''' is a character and recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background She is a master surgeon and deckhand from [Readceras](/readceras/). ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |none = |other = |crew = * {{crewrank|4|surgeon}} * {{crewrank|4|deckhand}} * Personality: Drunkard, Fearless * {{cp2|600}} to hire (only with the "Legendary Crew" [Berath's Blessing](/berathsBlessing/) enabled) }} [Category:Port Maje crew recruits](/categoryPortMajeCrewRecruits/) [Category:Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire crew members](/categoryPillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/)
